app_descript:
Brief: The Urban Dictionary app serves as a cultural time capsule by providing users with definitions that encapsulate modern vernacular and slang. This dynamic lexicon is powered by the people, for the people. It's the go-to resource for anyone looking to decipher contemporary lingo, culminating in a crowdsourced repository of words and phrases that gives insight into how language evolves in real-time.
